name: Interstate '76
description:
Interstate '76 is an action-racing game developed by Activision. It was originally released in 1997. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Interstate '76 has a Metascore of 80, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Interstate '76 on PC.
Scott Krager produced the game. Sean Vesce directed the game. Arion Salazar scored the game.
